title: Add Community Reviews social feed page with reactions

requirements.text: Create a new Community Reviews page at route /community that displays all users' reviews in a unified feed without linking to individual user collections or profile pages
acceptanceCriteria: New route /community is accessible
Page displays reviews from all users in chronological order
No links to user profiles or individual collections are present

requirements.text: Add 'Community Reviews' navigation link in the header that navigates to the new Community Reviews page
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation link appears in the header alongside existing navigation
Clicking the link navigates to /community route

requirements.text: Style Community Reviews page to match the existing dark theme with the same typography, spacing, rounded corners, hover effects, and gold/yellow rating bar style used in 'My Media Collection'
acceptanceCriteria: Page uses the same dark background colors and warm cinematic palette
Typography matches existing pages (Inter and Playfair Display fonts)
Card spacing and rounded corners match MediaCard component
Hover effects are consistent with existing collection cards

requirements.text: Display each review as a standalone card containing media title, media type badge (Movie, TV Show, Video Game, etc.), rating using the existing RatingBar component, review text, reviewer name in subtle styling, and date posted
acceptanceCriteria: Each review card shows the media title prominently
Media type badge displays the correct type with matching styling to existing badges
RatingBar component renders the rating value
Review text is displayed in full or with expansion capability
Reviewer name appears in muted/subtle text styling
Date posted is formatted and displayed clearly

requirements.text: Automatically fetch and display a relevant image for each review using the media title, placing it at the top of each card with a consistent aspect ratio, showing a clean themed placeholder if no image is found, and implementing lazy loading for performance
acceptanceCriteria: Images are fetched based on media title
Images appear at the top of each review card
All images maintain consistent aspect ratio across cards
Placeholder image matching the app theme displays when fetch fails
Images use lazy loading to improve initial page load performance

requirements.text: Implement an emoji reaction bar under each review with üëç ‚ù§Ô∏è üòÇ üòÆ üò¢ üî• emojis that allows users to react with dynamic count updates without page refresh
acceptanceCriteria: Reaction bar displays all six emoji options below each review
Clicking an emoji increments its count immediately without refresh
Visual feedback indicates which reactions the current user has selected
Counts update in real-time when reactions are added

requirements.text: Store emoji reactions per review in the backend database and prevent duplicate reactions from the same user for the same emoji on the same review
acceptanceCriteria: Reactions are persisted in the backend with review ID, user ID, and emoji type
System prevents a user from reacting with the same emoji multiple times on one review
Reaction counts are accurately retrieved and aggregated per review
Users can remove their reaction by clicking the same emoji again

requirements.text: Create backend endpoint to fetch all reviews across all users for the Community Reviews feed
acceptanceCriteria: New query function returns all media entries with reviews from all users
Response includes reviewer name/identifier for each entry
Results are sorted by creation date (newest first)
Function is accessible to all authenticated users

constraints: Do not modify the existing My Media Collection page or Dashboard component
Do not create links to individual user collections or profile pages from Community Reviews
Maintain the current cinematic aesthetic with warm burgundy and gold tones
Use the existing RatingBar component without modification
Preserve all existing backend authorization and access control logic
nonGoals: Adding user profile pages or profile linking functionality
Implementing real-time WebSocket updates for reactions
Adding comment threads or nested discussions on reviews
